Hi, my name is Shashank Priyadarshi "
" "
" Android Developer | Open Source Enthusiast | Python | Java | Techie | Guitarist "
" "
" Member at amFOSS, Amritapuri "
" Currently I am pursuing Btech in AIE from Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham. I am from Varanasi (Uttar Pradesh). I am presently living at Amritapuri. Seeking to increase knowledge about Artificial Intelligence and machine learning. Also learning about digital manufacturing, elements of computer science. "
" "
" Programming always fascinated me. Developing a logic of a program is my first priority.I always used to focus on logic rather than just random thinking.I am Diploma in Computer Management which includes a degree in Hardware, Software and Networking.I also completed my plus 2 having optional as computer science where I learnt Python as a programming language.I am keen learner. "
" "
" My hobbies are playing guitar, playing cricket, travelling, photography "
" "
" Technical achievements "
" I completed DCM in class 11 in parallel with my plus 1.It is a two year course which includes basics of Software, Hardware and Networking. "
" "
